thread.title: Police: Man in custody after breeching checkpoint at O’Hare
thread.title_full: Police: Man in custody after breeching checkpoint at O’Hare

author: Jordan Owen
title: Police: Man in custody after breeching checkpoint at O’Hare
text:
Police: Man in custody after breeching checkpoint at O’Hare 
Sun-Times file photo @byjordanowen | Sign-Up for our News & Politics Newsletter Sign-Up 
A man is in custody early Sunday after he breeched a checkpoint at O’Hare International Airport and tried to board a plane. 
About 4:45 a.m., the man breeched a checkpoint in Terminal 3 and tried to board an aircraft, according to Chicago Police. 
Officers prevented him from entering the gate and the man attacked the officers, striking them repeatedly, police said. 
He was taken into custody and taken to Resurrection Medical Center for a mental evaluation, police said. 
A Chicago Police officer suffered injuries to the face and was also taken to Resurrection for treatment, police said. Previously from Chicago News
